sec.title: Ethics approval and consent to participate
sec.p: All research projects mentioned in the manuscript had undertaken ethics review and received approval from the respective national ethics review committees and the Ethics Review Committee of the World Health Organization, Geneva, Switzerland.

sec.title: Consent for publication
sec.p: Consent for publication is given by the author.

sec.title: Competing interests
sec.p: The author declares that she has no competing interests.
